message: I'm excited to offer you this product! It's a great deal at $100, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I'll throw in a special bonus worth $10 if you buy it from me today. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer and the bonus. I appreciate the value you're adding to the product. I'll take it!

I'm thrilled to offer you this premium product! It's a game-changer in its category, and I'm confident you'll be blown away by its performance. At $100, it's an absolute steal. Plus, I'll give you a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try it risk-free. What do you think?
I'm intrigued by your description and the additional benefits. Given the premium nature of the product and the guarantee, I'm willing to take the chance. Let's go for it!

I've got a real showstopper for you this time! This product is a limited edition release, and I'm the only one with it. It's a bit of a risk, but I'm willing to make a deal. I'll give you an exclusive discount, just for you, and throw in a second product of equal value absolutely free. That's a total value of $200 for just $100. What do you say?
Wow, that sounds like an incredible opportunity! With the exclusive discount, the second product, and the potential value, I'm definitely interested. Let's do this!

I've got another top-of-the-line product for you! This one's a real head-turner, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a special exception for you, and I'll give you a 10% discount on the spot. That brings the price down to $90. Plus, I'll throw in a personalized setup and training session, worth $20, absolutely free. What do you think?
That sounds like a fantastic deal, especially with the discount and the added training session. I appreciate the personal touch and the value you're adding. I'll take it!
